alert.note: Alert for Anson; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Anson and Stanly Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Midland, or 14 miles north of Monroe, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Ansonville, Plyler, Midland, Polkton, Locust, Norwood, Oakboro, Stanfield and Peachland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
